data.lyric:
[ti:Allergic (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Allergic (Explicit) - Post Malone
[00:06.85]Wasted on Sunday
[00:09.51]Erase you on Monday allergic
[00:15.94]Allergic
[00:19.94]Gave in by Friday
[00:22.82]Went straight back to sideways allergic
[00:29.19]Allergic
[00:32.68]I took your pills and your drugs just to feel something else
[00:38.91]'Cause I can't feel you no more
[00:45.18]So sad but true
[00:48.63]You're friends with all my demons
[00:51.95]The only one that sees them
[00:55.40]Too bad for you
[00:58.38]So sad but true
[01:01.86]Gave a hundred million reasons
[01:05.19]But why can't you believe them
[01:08.60]Too bad for you
[01:12.38]Yeah we fight and we f**k until we open the cuts
[01:15.52]And now we're soberin' up but never sober enough allergic
[01:22.15]Allergic
[01:25.59]Instead of holdin' me down you're only holding me up
[01:28.76]It shouldn't be so hard this is impossible love allergic
[01:35.37]Allergic
[01:38.80]I took your pills and your drugs just to feel something else
[01:45.06]'Cause I can't feel you no more
[01:51.43]So sad but true
[01:54.91]You're friends with all my demons
[01:58.19]The only one that sees them
[02:01.49]Too bad for you
[02:04.61]So sad but true
[02:07.91]Gave a hundred million reasons
[02:11.36]But why can't you believe them
[02:14.67]Too bad for you
[02:17.77]So sad but true
[02:21.25]Gave a hundred million reasons
[02:24.68]But why can't you believe them
[02:27.92]Too bad for you
data.trans:
[ti:Allergic (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:Hollywood’s Bleeding (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:06.85]在周日烂醉如泥
[00:09.51]在周一将你抹去记忆 我不喜欢这样
[00:15.94]我不喜欢这样
[00:19.94]在周五屈服
[00:22.82]又直接回到了宿醉的状态 我不喜欢这样
[00:29.19]我不喜欢这样
[00:32.68]我服下了你的药 想要感受其他东西
[00:38.91]因为我再也感受不到你
[00:45.18]那么悲伤 又那么真实
[00:48.63]你和我所有的心魔做了朋友
[00:51.95]你是唯一能看见他们的人
[00:55.40]这对你来说没什么好处
[00:58.38]那么悲伤 又那么真实
[01:01.86]说出了千万种理由
[01:05.19]你为何没有相信呢
[01:08.60]这对你来说没什么好处
[01:12.38]我们争吵打斗着 直到两败俱伤
[01:15.52]我们正恢复清醒 但这远远不够
[01:22.15]我不喜欢这样
[01:25.59]你没有打压我 反而是支持我
[01:28.76]这不应该如此困难 这是不可能的爱 我不喜欢这样
[01:35.37]我不喜欢这样
[01:38.80]我服下了你的药 想要感受其他东西
[01:45.06]因为我再也感受不到你
[01:51.43]那么悲伤 又那么真实
[01:54.91]你和我所有的心魔做了朋友
[01:58.19]你是唯一能看见他们的人
[02:01.49]这对你来说没什么好处
[02:04.61]那么悲伤 又那么真实
[02:07.91]说出了千万种理由
[02:11.36]你为何没有相信呢
[02:14.67]这对你来说没什么好处
[02:17.77]那么悲伤 又那么真实
[02:21.25]说出了千万种理由
[02:24.68]你为何没有相信呢
[02:27.92]这对你来说没什么好处
